SELECT com.*, f.id parent_id, f.`name` parent_name, f.`icon` parent_icon, f.type parent_type FROM sys_resources com LEFT JOIN sys_resources f ON com.parent_id = f.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( com.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords , jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR com.url LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords , jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR com.permission LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords , jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
ORDER by com.parent_id ASC, com.name DESC

SELECT re.id, re.`name`, re.parent_id, re.url, re.type, re.icon, ( CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_role_resources rr WHERE rr.resources_id = re.id AND rr.role_id = #{rid} ) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) AS checked FROM sys_resources re ORDER BY re.sort ASC
SELECT url, permission FROM sys_resources WHERE url is not null order by sort asc

SELECT r.id, r.name, node.id as node_id, node.name as node_name, node.parent_id from sys_resources r left join sys_resources node on( node.parent_id=id AND node.available=1 AND node.type='menu' ) WHERE r.available=1 AND r.type='menu' AND (r.url IS NULL OR r.url = '') AND (r.permission IS NULL OR r.permission = '') ORDER BY r.sort ASC, node.sort ASC

SELECT re.id, re.`name`, re.parent_id, re.url, re.permission, re.icon, re.sort FROM sys_resources re INNER JOIN sys_role_resources rr ON re.id = rr.resources_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rr.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND re.available = 1 ORDER BY re.parent_id ASC, re.sort ASC
